title: The Unconditional Love of God
itunes:title: The Unconditional Love of God
description:
Sometimes we feel like God is counting our failures against us, but the Bible says He loved us while we were yet sinners. God is not focused on what you're doing wrong; He sees you as a work in progress. Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
